Developer Terms of Use
des:
With this skill you can control your Tevolve radiators by voice.

To use the skill you must follow these instructions:

 1. Have a Tevolve account. You can sign up through the Tevolve app or the web https://tevolve.termoweb.net
 2. Have a home registered in the Tevolve account with at least one radiator installed, set a name for each radiator in your Tevolve home.
 3. Select «Enable» button in the Alexa application to link your Tevolve account and activate the skill
 4. You can create an Alexa group, like Home or Bedroom, and add the device to the group. 

More information is available at Create a Smart Home Device Group:
https://www.amazon.com/gp/help/customer/display.html?nodeId=201749250


Below is a list of commands that you can use once you have the skill activated:
"Alexa set the living room off"
“Alexa turn down the living room temperature”
"Alexa, increase Bedroom by 1 degree"
"Alexa, decrease Bedroom by 2 degrees"
"Alexa, set Bedroom temperature to 21 degrees"
"Alexa, what is the Living Room set to?"
"Alexa, turn off the heating"
